name: Skeleton Punchers
description:
Explosive 2D Pixel Art Action!
The Zerpian army of the night has taken control of the flow of time! Can a ragtag group of combatants punch enough skeletons to restore natural order and stop the Patrician from reviving President Johnavan? With a little extra dimensional help, it may not be as impossible as it seems!

-Collect and power up items!
-Day/Night cycle that affects which items are currently active!
-Complete Stages and Bonus Minigames to unlock new Characters and Equipment!
-Play as a variety of unique characters!
-PLAY SKELETON PUNCHERS!
